name: Cusano - 18 Paired Maduro - Toro
additionalNotes: As it's predecessor, the Cusano 18, the Paired Maduro breaks from the traditional wrapper-binder-filler configuration by using two wrapper leaves and filler instead. The filler is is bound and wrapped with one Brazilian Mata Fina wrapper and one Broadleaf USA Maduro wrapper. The Cusano 18 Paired Maduro is made with an all-Dominican filler of Olor, Piloto and Gold. The Gold tobacco has been aged for 18 years.
